adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with DEFAULT_SELECTION
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT allowed
KA-2 Scope: DEFAULT_SELECTION must be removed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Color Semantics
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight uses color with semantic meaning
typical_implementation: Green color for highlighted item (implies correct/good)
Blue color for highlighted item (implies primary/important)
Red color for highlighted item (implies urgent/important)
Yellow/Orange color for highlighted item (implies warning/attention)
violated_constraints: KA-2 Hard Constraint: No color semantics allowed
KA-2 Definition: Only border/background/weight differences allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Icons
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight includes icons or symbols
typical_implementation: Arrow icon pointing to highlighted item
violated_constraints: KA-2 Hard Constraint: No icons allowed
KA-2 Definition: Only CSS visual differences allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Animation
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight includes animation or motion
violated_constraints: KA-2 Hard Constraint: No animation allowed
KA-2 Definition: Visual difference must be static

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Text Labels
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight combined with text labels
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT allowed
KA-2 Hard Constraint: No text hints allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Sorting Change
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight combined with sorting change
typical_implementation: Move highlighted item to top of list
Reorder list to put highlighted item first
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT allowed
KA-2 Hard Constraint: No sorting changes allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Hover State Change
typical_implementation: Hover changes highlight to stronger visual difference
violated_constraints: KA-2 Hard Constraint: No hover changes leading to difference expansion

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with State Memory
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight based on previous session state
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT allowed
KA-2 Hard Constraint: No state memory allowed
KA-2 Definition: Visual difference must be static

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Multiple Visual Differences
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight uses multiple visual differences simultaneously
typical_implementation: Border change AND font weight change
violated_constraints: KA-2 Definition: Minimal injection unit (single visual difference only)
Single Variable Principle: Single minimal visual difference

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Background Change
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight uses background color change
typical_implementation: Different background color for highlighted item
violated_constraints: KA-2 Definition: Only border/background/weight differences allowed (but no color semantics)
Note: Background change may introduce color semantics

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Font Weight Change
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight uses font weight change
typical_implementation: Heavier font weight for highlighted item
Lighter font weight for highlighted item
violated_constraints: KA-2 Definition: Font weight difference is allowed, but may be too prominent
Note: Border difference chosen for minimal visual difference

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Size Change
typical_implementation: Larger font size for highlighted item
Larger button size for highlighted item
violated_constraints: KA-2 Definition: Size change not listed as allowed minimal unit
Note: Only border/background/weight differences allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Multiple Items
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight applied to multiple items
violated_constraints: KA-2 Definition: Minimal injection unit (single item only)
Single Variable Principle: Single visual highlight

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Process Guidance
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight combined with process guidance
typical_implementation: Highlight item and show 'Next step' hint
Highlight item and guide through process
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT allowed
KA-2 Hard Constraint: No process guidance allowed

adversarial_patterns.name: VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT with Grouping
adversarial_patterns.description: Visual highlight combined with grouping or classification
typical_implementation: Group capabilities, then highlight first in 'featured' group
Classify capabilities, then highlight from 'important' category
Organize capabilities, then highlight from 'recommended' section
violated_constraints: Single Variable Principle: Only VISUAL_HIGHLIGHT allowed
KA-2 Hard Constraint: No grouping changes allowed
